input_data.title: Jekyll and Hyde
input_data.overview: Inspired by the original novella by Robert Louis Stevenson, Jekyll and Hyde is set in 1930s London and follows Robert Jekyll, the grandson of Henry Jekyll, on his quest to discover his real identity, his true family history and the nature of his ‘curse’ – which his foster father, Dr Vishal Najaran, is controlling with medication. His journey takes him into a dark and unforgiving place, as his alter ego seems capable of anything. At the same time there are shadowy forces trying to find Jekyll and the source of his powers.

response.analytical_summary: Jekyll and Hyde is a British drama series set in 1930s London, reimagining the classic Robert Louis Stevenson story. The series blends elements of action, adventure, and science fiction/fantasy, exploring themes of identity, duality, and the corrupting influence of power. The narrative follows Robert Jekyll as he investigates his family history and grapples with a dangerous alter ego, while also contending with external forces seeking to exploit his abilities. The show offers a suspenseful and visually striking experience, steeped in gothic atmosphere and driven by a central mystery.
response.spoiler_rich_plot_summary: The series begins with Robert Jekyll, raised under the care of Dr. Vishal Najaran, who controls Robert’s alter ego, Hyde, through medication. As Robert grows older, he begins to question his past and the nature of his condition, leading him on a quest to uncover the truth about his grandfather, Henry Jekyll, and the origins of his curse. His investigation reveals a complex web of scientific experimentation, secret societies, and a legacy of dark secrets. Robert’s attempts to understand and control Hyde become increasingly difficult, as his alter ego’s actions grow more violent and unpredictable. He discovers that others are seeking to harness Hyde’s power for their own nefarious purposes, forcing him to confront not only his inner demons but also external threats. The series culminates in a confrontation where Robert must make a difficult choice to protect himself and those around him, ultimately facing the consequences of his dual nature and the legacy of his family’s dark history.
response.keyword_sentence: Set in 1930s London, Jekyll and Hyde is a dark and suspenseful drama series exploring themes of identity and duality through a mystery-driven narrative blending elements of crime procedural and supernatural thriller.
